category: Articles of Incorporation/Article 19-2 (Restrictions on dismissal of officers)
contents: Article 19-2 (Restrictions on dismissal of executive directors from membership) The chairman of the board may restrict executive directors from dismissal from office when they fall under any of the following: 1. They are being investigated or indicted in relation to misconduct; 2. When the internal audit department or external audit agency requests severe disciplinary action as a result of the audit, or when the disciplinary committee, etc. requests a decision on severe disciplinary action, [This article was newly established on December 29, 2014]
